translations: 十分位（tenth 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: The CPI was up six-tenths of a percent in October.
sentences.translation: 在10月份，消费者物价指数升高了0.6%。

sentences.sentence: Retail sales dipped six-tenths of a percent last month, largely because Americans were buying fewer cars.
sentences.translation: 零售额上个月下降了0.6%，主要是由于美国人汽车买得更少了。

sentences.sentence: But recently executions in Singapore have fallen by nine-tenths.
sentences.translation: 然而，最近新加坡的死刑处决率下跌了十分之九。
